articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.title: China says world should stick to 'One China' after Tsai win
articles.description: China says that the international community should abide by the idea that there is only one China, ruled by the Communist Party, after Taiwan reelected its democratic leader
articles.content:
BEIJING -- 
China said Sunday that the world should abide by the idea that there is only one China, ruled by the Communist Party, after Taiwan reelected its democratic leader.
We hope and believe that the international community will continue adhering to th… [+1092 chars]

articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.title: Miami Beach officer injured in South Beach shooting
articles.description: A shooting in Miami Beach’s tourist-filled South Beach neighborhood has left a police officer and one other person hospitalized
articles.content:
MIAMI BEACH, Fla. -- 
A shooting in Miami Beachs tourist-filled South Beach neighborhood left a police officer and one other person hospitalized Saturday night.

articles.author: NICK PERRY Associated Press
articles.title: Firefighter dies as Australia plans to adapt to wildfires
articles.description: A firefighter has died battling the Australian wildfire crisis and the prime minister has said his government is adapting and building resilience to the fire danger posed by climate change
articles.content:
BURRAGATE, Australia -- 
Another firefighter has died battling the Australian wildfire crisis and the prime minister on Sunday said his government was adapting and building resilience to the fire danger posed by climate change.
